title: GET_NEXT_AUDIBLE_BEAT
content:
0xC64A06D939F826F5// GetNextAudibleBeat
BOOL GET_NEXT_AUDIBLE_BEAT(float* timeInSeconds, float* bpm, int* beatNum);Parameters:timeInSeconds: time in seconds until the start of the next beatbpm: current tempo in beats per minute,beatNum: integer beat within the barReturns: Returns information on beat information for any audible music.
codeBlocks:
// GetNextAudibleBeat
BOOL GET_NEXT_AUDIBLE_BEAT(float* timeInSeconds, float* bpm, int* beatNum);
